```{r}

class(me) <- "my_functions"
```

```{r}
me.link <- function(href = '',content = ' '){
  a <- '<a href="'
  b <- '", target = "_blank">'
  c <- '</a>'
  return(paste(a,href,b,content,c))
}
```

```{r}
me.hi<- function(text){
  return(paste('<span class="high">',text,'</span>'))
}
```
```{r}
me.def<- function(text){
  return(paste('<span class="my-def">',text,'</span>'))
}
```
